txt.en:
'Greetings again, [placeholder]. So the Orcs of Durbúrz-stazg have one of the strange trolls that have been seen by our forces in the east? Olog-hai, I believe they are called.

'These creatures are of a fearsome sort, invulnerable to the effects of sunlight. I need you to find this creature they name Skûm and defeat him. Alas, I have no words of advice for you...I have never faced a creature such as this, for it is no ordinary troll.

'Skûm, from what you tell me, still roams among the Orcs of Durbúrz-stazg to the north. Be careful to enter the encampment through the eastern gate.'
'The death of this creature will be a mighty blow to the heart of the Enemy. You have our gratitude, [placeholder], Skûm-slayer.'
'Skûm is a troll of a different kind...olog-hai, I believe they are called. He must not be allowed to remain in Durbúrz-stazg.'
The Elves of the Golden Host seek a way to cripple the Orcs of Durbúrz-stazg.

The eastern gate of Durbúrz-stazg lies to the north of Echad Sirion.\n\nTethafnel has asked you to defeat the Olog-hai warrior Skûm at Durbúrz-stazg. You will need to enter the encampment through the eastern gate.
Talk to Tethafnel at Echad Sirion
Echad Sirion lies to the south of Durbúrz-stazg.\n\nYou should return to Tethafnel with news of your victory against the olog-hai Skûm.
